# types.backends.validate_backend { #cdesym.types.backends.validate_backend }

```python
types.backends.validate_backend(backend)
```

Validate and normalize backend string.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name    | Type   | Description              | Default    |
|---------|--------|--------------------------|------------|
| backend | str    | Backend name to validate | _required_ |

## Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type    | Description               |
|--------|---------|---------------------------|
|        | Backend | Validated backend (typed) |

## Raises {.doc-section .doc-section-raises}

| Name   | Type       | Description             |
|--------|------------|-------------------------|
|        | ValueError | If backend is not valid |

## Examples {.doc-section .doc-section-examples}

```python
>>> validate_backend('numpy')
'numpy'
>>> validate_backend('pytorch')  # ValueError
```
